sentence.Network_en: It is illegal and could endanger other people's lives.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是非法的，可能会危及他人的生命。

sentence.Network_en: Toxic waste could endanger lives and poison fish.
sentence.Network_cn: 有毒废物可能危及生命，毒死鱼类。

sentence.Network_en: Development of the area would endanger wildlife.
sentence.Network_cn: 开发这一地区将会危及野生生物。

entry.def: To endanger something or someone means to put them in a situation where they might be harmed or destroyed completely.

example.ex: The debate could endanger the proposed peace talks.
example.tran: 这一争论可能会危及提议进行的和平谈判。

example.ex: ...endangered species such as lynx and wolf.

means.word_mean: 1. pose a threat to; present a danger to;
2. put in a dangerous, disadvantageous, or difficult position

auth_sentence.content: An epidemic that might endanger everybody in that area.
auth_sentence.res_content: An epidemic that might endanger everybody in that area.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An epidemic that might endanger everybody in that area.

auth_sentence.content: This will endanger the very basis of relativity.
auth_sentence.res_content: This will endanger the very basis of relativity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This will endanger the very basis of relativity.

auth_sentence.content: But Vietnam says those Chinese patrols endanger navigation.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Vietnam says those Chinese patrols endanger navigation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Vietnam says those Chinese patrols endanger navigation.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 动词前缀,通常加在名词前构成动词,表示"进入……之中,包围,成为"; 2. 动词前缀,表示"使……进入状态或加强等意思"

stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+dem人民+ic表形容词→在人民之中→地方性的
en进入……之中,包围,成为+cage笼子→v.关入笼中
en进入……之中,包围,成为+chain锁链→v.束缚
en进入……之中,包围,成为+roll转,倦→往里倦→注册

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+title标题,头衔→v. 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
en进入……之中,包围,成为+trap陷阱→v.以网或陷阱捕捉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+purple紫→v.使成紫色 v.发紫
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+act行动→进入行动→颁布[法令]
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+chant反复说;咒语→被咒语所迷醉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+courage勇气→使人进入勇气→鼓励
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+danger危险→v.使危险
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+franchise特权,公民权→给予选举权

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使忙碌, 雇佣, 预定
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+gage挑战→进入挑战→忙碌于……
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+large大→v.扩大, 放大
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+light光+en变成→给人光明→启发
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+list名单→进入名单→入伍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+rich富的→v.使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+wrap包裹→v.包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注

sentences.en: You will endanger your health if you smoke.
sentences.cn: 你如果吸烟, 就会危及健康。

sentences.en: The drift of the icebergs in the sea endangers the ships.
sentences.cn: 海上冰山的漂流危及船只的安全。

sentences.en: Poison gas blew off and endangered the lives of hundreds of persons.
sentences.cn: 毒气喷出来,危及几百人的生命。
